channel.title: Exion [PI] Questions
channel.description:
Hey, Okay so my old source files got deleted somehow.. and now I'm restarting... I have a few questions:
I put False on 'Admins can Trade' and 'Admins can Drop', however after compiling and everything, they can still trade and drop. I also had a command that made someone disconnect when they type ::noclip, can someone give me a code for that as well?
Please help =)))))))))))))
Thanks, ~Keat

item.title: Exion [PI] Questions
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

Hm, this is so weird. I don’t think i’ve ever had this problem with my previous servers… :L

edit: I will be back in about 5-7 minutes :b

Read full topic

item.title: Exion [PI] Questions
item.dc:creator: @Keatrm Keatrm
item.description:
@Keatrm wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:384804”]For trading go to Trade.java and put this in if(c.playerRights == 2 && !Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE) { c.sendMessage("Trading as an admin has been disabled."); return; }
for dropping go to PlayerAssistant.java find if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) { and then delete that and put in somewhere under that if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS)) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems();[/quote]

I did the thing for trading, and they can still trade , I’m trying the drop thing now though.
(any idea how to do ::noclip disconnecting thing?)

EDIT: it lets me drop things D:

Read full topic

item.title: Exion [PI] Questions
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

For trading go to Trade.java and put this in if(c.playerRights == 2 && !Config.ADMIN_CAN_TRADE) { c.sendMessage("Trading as an admin has been disabled."); return; }
for dropping go to PlayerAssistant.java find if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) { and then delete that and put in somewhere under that if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS)) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems();

Read full topic
